LanguageData.RecoveredFromErrorsDialogTitle: Taastatud ühtimatust või korrupeerunud modifikatsiooni krahhist
LanguageData.RecoveredFromErrorsText:
Tundub, et mõningad aktiivsed modifikatsioonid põhjustasid krahhi.

Nad olid ühtimatud üksteisega, loodud mõnele teisele RimWorld'i versioonile või olid korrupeerunud.

Kõik modifikatsioonid on välja lülitatud ja on võimalik uuesti aktiveerida modifikatsioonide menüüst.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingAssets: Viga mängu Mängufailide laadimisel. Vaata vealogi rohkema informatsiooni jaoks.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingAssets_ModsInfo: Mäng jookseb hetkel kohandatud modifikatsioonidega, need võivad põhjustada probleeme.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileGeneratingMap: Viga mapi genereerimise ajal. Vaata vealogi rohkema informatsiooni jaoks.
LanguageData.ErrorWhileLoadingMap: Viga mapi laadimisel. Vaata vealogi rohkema informatsiooni jaoks.
LanguageData.SteamClientMissing:
Ei saanud initialiseerida Steam'i API'd. Võimalikud põhjused:

-Steam ei tööta.
-Käima pandud väljaspool Steam'i ilma steam_appid.txt'ita kaustas.
-Jookseb erinevate lubadega kui Steam'i klient (e.g. "administraatorina").

Enamus juhtudel sinu arvuti taaskäivitina parandab selle probleemi.

Steam'i versioon mängust vajab Steam'i töötamiseks ja seetõttu nüüd sulgub.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromDifferentGameVersion: Praegune versioon on {0}, aga salvestusfail on pärit versioonist {1}, mis on täielikult erinev versioon.\n\nSelle salvestuse laadimine arvatavasti ei tööta.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromDifferentGameBuild: Praegune versioon on {0}, aga salvestusfail on pärit versioonist {1}, mis on erinev revisjon.\n\nSelle salvestuse laadimine peaks veel töötama.
LanguageData.SaveIsFromThisGameBuild: Salvestusfail on salvestatud praeguse mänguversiooniga ja peaks töötama vigadeta.
LanguageData.SaveIsUnknownFormat: Salvestusfail on tundmatus formaadis ja peaaegu kindlasti ei tööta õigesti.
LanguageData.NameColonyMessage: Tundub, et sa viibid siin mõnda aega. {0} soovitab, et sa annaksid kolooniale nime.\n\nMis peaks koloonia nimi olema?
LanguageData.ColonyNameIsInvalid: See koloonia nimi ei ole sobiv.
LanguageData.ConfirmResolutionChange: Sa oled muutnud oma ekraaniseadeid. Kas uued seaded töötavad hästi?\n\nAutomaat-lähtestamine {0}...
LanguageData.ResearchMenuWithoutBench: Kuni sa ehitad uurimistöö laua, sinu kolonistid ei saa teha uurimistööd teha.\n\nAga sa saad siiski vaadata uurimistöö projekte hetkel.
LanguageData.MapTemperatureDangerWarning: Hoiatus: Sa maandud külmunud keskkonnas. See võib-olla raske või peaaegu võimatu ellu jääda. Kui sa ei taha ekstreemset väljakutset, siis vali erinev maandumiskoht või hooaeg.
LanguageData.MapSizePerformanceWarning: Hoiatus: Mängu jõudlus võib väheneda suurtel mappidel. Ludeonicrous suurus on testimatta ja peaaegu kindlasti ei mängi hästi.
LanguageData.PermadeathModeInfo: Lõppsurma moodis saad sa ainult ühe salvestusfaili ja saad salvestada ainult mängust väljudes. Sa ei saa mängu uuesti laadida, et parandada vigu ja kui su koloonia sureb, siis on see kõik.\n\nSee on kuidas RimWorld'i on mõeldud mängitama, väga dramaatiliste pööretega, mis mängivad välja täieliku mõjuga.
LanguageData.RecipeCannotHaveTargetCount: (Sellel retseptil ei saa olla sihtmärkkogus, sest sellel on mitu või ettearvamatud saadused)
LanguageData.BillRequiresMayVary: Märkus: väike-mahu koostisosad nagu kuld vajavad 20x rohkem.
LanguageData.ThisIsSmallVolume: See on väike-mahu koostisosa. See tähendab, et ika 'ühik' on ainult 1/20 sama palju kui normaal-mahu koostisosa. Et täita samad koostisosa kogused, vajad sa 20x rohkem kui tavaliselt.
LanguageData.GrowingTimeDesc: Taimed kasvab ainult osa päevas ja ainult siis kui on piisavalt valgust. See statistika mõõdab kui palju aega taim tegelikult peab kasvama, et kasvada täissuuruseks. Tegelik päris kasvamisaeg on üldiselt umbes kaks korda pikem. Madalad temperatuurid vähendavad samuti kasvukiirust.
LanguageData.WildnessExplanation: Metsikuid loomi on raskem talsutada, treenida ja käsitseda.
LanguageData.AnimalFilthRateExplanation: Loomad toodavad mustust kui liiguvad ringi konstrueeritud põrandatel. See on keskmine kogus toodetud mustust {0} kõnnitud bloki kohta.\n\nSuuremad või vähem kodulooma moodi loomad toodavad rohkem mustust.
LanguageData.BuyPriceDesc: Hind, mis sa maksad kui sa ostad selle.
LanguageData.SellPriceDesc: Hind, mis sa saad selle müümise eest.
LanguageData.ColonyCount: Kui palju on seda kaupa koloonial valmis kauplemiseks.\n\nSa saad ainult müüa asju orbitaalkauplejatele, kui nad on väljas ja kaubamajakate lähedal.
LanguageData.TraderCount: Kui palju on seda kaupa kauplejal valmis kauplemiseks.
LanguageData.YourTradeableSilverTip: Sa saad ainult kaubelda hõbedaga, mis on kaubamajakate lähedal ja pole katuse all.
LanguageData.TraderWillNotTrade: Kaupleja pole nõus seda kaupa sisse vahetama.
LanguageData.NegotiatorTalkingImpaired:
Sinu kaupleja {0} ei saa rääkida halva tervise tõttu.

See mõjutab kaubahindu.

Kaalu parema tervisega kaupleja kasutamist.
LanguageData.ConfirmTraderShortFunds: Kauplejal on ebasobiv kogus, et täielikult katta see vahetus. Jätkata sellest hoolimata?
LanguageData.HistoryUploadMessage: Kas sa tahad laadida üles enda mängimise andmed RimWorld'i serveritesse, et aidata arendajatel mängu parandada? Kui sa nõustud, siis sinu andmed laetakse üles iga {0} päeva järel (ja mõningatel teistel harudastel juhtudel nagu mängu lõpp). Privaatsuseelistusi saab vahetada hiljem seadete menüüs.
LanguageData.HistoryUploadMessagePlayerName: Kuigi ajalugu on saadetud anonüümselt, saad sa lisada oma nime.
LanguageData.HistoryUploadNoOnce: Ära lae üles seekord, küsi hiljem uuesti
LanguageData.NoGrowerCanPlant: {0} vajab {1} oskust kasvatamises, et külvata.\n\nÜkski sinu kasvatajatest ei ole võimeline seda külvama.

ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_EquipmentAndApp: {0} will take the following items with HIM:
SplitCaravanThingCountTip: How many of this item the caravan has ready to give to the new caravan.
ModsChanged: The mod list has changed. The game will now restart automatically.
CaravanMassUsageTooltip:
Current mass usage and mass capacity.

Mass usage includes the assigned caravan supplies as well as the colonists' current equipment.

You will not be able to send the caravan if the mass usage exceedes capacity.
GameUpdatedToNewVersionSteam:
If you wish to continue with the old version, you can opt in using Steam's "Betas" feature.

 1. In the Steam library, right-click RimWorld.
 2. Click Properties.
 3. Click the Betas tab.
 4. Select the version you want from the drop-down menu.

Old versions will be likely removed from this list eventually - we just didn't want to cut off games in progress.

Note that if mod authors update their mods for a new game version, they'll probably stop working on an old version. You may want to turn off automatic updates to prevent this.
NamePlayerFactionMessage: {0} thinks that you should give your faction a name. What should your faction be called?
TransporterItemIsUnreachableSingle: There is no path between the transport pods and the {0}.
ConfirmAbandonHomeNegativeThoughts: Abandoning {0} will cause the following people to get the following thoughts:
CantSendEmptyTransportPods: You can't send empty transport pods.
ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_IndividualThoug: Abandoning {0} will cause the following people to get the following thoughts:
CaravanCouldNotFindReachableExitSpot: Warning: some of the assigned colonists are unable to reach the exit location ({0}).
FormCaravanColonyThingCountTip: How many of this item the colony has ready to give to the caravan.
MoodThresholdColumnDesc: The colonists will take this drug only if their mood level is below this threshold.
CaravanItemIsUnreachableSingle: None of the assigned colonists are able to reach the {0}.
DaysWorthOfFoodInfoRot: {0} days worth of food, rot in {1} days
FrequencyColumnDesc: How often the colonists should try to take this drug.
CaravanPawnIsUnreachable: {0} is unreachable by any of the assigned colonists.
PackAnimalExplanation: Whether this animal is appropriate to use to carry items in a caravan over long distances.
DrugUsageTipForJoy:
For joy

Use this drug for joy and social purposes.

Even if disabled, some characters with specific traits, or on mental breaks, may use the drug anyway.
ConfirmLeavePrisonersOrAnimalsBehind:
There are still some prisoners or animals left in this area and this is the only caravan they can join at the moment.

If you move your caravan, they won't be able to leave the area until you are back. The prisoners will start escaping, while the animals will keep waiting for you.

If you decide to wait, they will try to join your caravan as soon as possible.

Are you sure you want to move your caravan?
CaravanItemIsUnreachableMulti: None of the assigned colonists are able to reach {0}x {1}.
CaravanCouldNotFindExitSpot: The chosen exit location ({0}) is inaccessible.
DaysWorthOfFoodWarningDialog_NoFood: Your caravan has no food and will become hungry very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog: Do you really want to abandon {0}?
TransporterItemIsUnreachableMulti: There is no path between the transport pods and {0}x {1}.
TooBigCaravanMassUsage: The caravan is not able to carry that much.
GameUpdatedToNewVersionInitial: RimWorld has been updated from version {0} to version {1}.
PlayerFactionGainsName: Your faction is now known as {0}.
GameUpdatedToNewVersionNonSteam: Since this is a DRM-free copy, you can install the game twice in two different folders, to be able to play both old and new versions.
DrugUsageTipForAddiction:
For addictions

Use this drug to feed already-established addiction needs.

Even if disabled, some characters with specific traits, or on mental breaks, may use the drug anyway.
CaravanFormationProcessStarted: Your colonists will now take the assigned items and leave the area as soon as possible.
CaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneColonist: You must assign at least one non-downed colonist.
NamePlayerFactionBaseMessage: Since it looks like you'll be here for a while, {0} thinks that you should give this community a name. What should the local community be called?
DrugUsageTipScheduled: Scheduled\n\nUse this drug on a defined schedule, when specific conditions are met.
DaysWorthOfFoodWarningDialog: Your caravan only has {0} days worth of food and will become hungry very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
DaysWorthOfFoodTooltip_CanEatLocalPlants: Based on the current season, temperature, and surroundings we assume that it WILL be possible for herbivore animals to eat local plants. This however can change at any time.
PlayerFactionAndBaseGainsName: Your faction is now known as {0}, and this community is now known as {1}.
DrugUsageColumnDesc: How the drug is allowed to be used.
SourceCaravanMustHaveAtLeastOneColonist: You must leave at least one non-downed colonist.
NamePlayerFactionBaseMessage_NameFaction: Since it looks like you'll be here for a while, {0} also thinks that you should give this community a name. What should this local community be called?
DaysWorthOfFoodTooltip: An approximate number of days before the caravan runs out of food.\n\nThis takes into account both human and animal food, and shows the worst case scenario. This means that after this many days, at least one person or animal will be out of food.
JoyThresholdColumnDesc: The colonists will take this drug only if their joy level is below this threshold.
CaravanFoodWillRotSoonWarningDialog: A large part of the assigned food will rot soon.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
ConfirmSendNotCompletelyLoadedPods: Pod group isn’t completely loaded. {0} is missing. Launch anyway?
NoExitDirectionForCaravanChosen: You must choose an exit direction for the caravan.
CoverEffectivenessExplanation: How effective this is when used as cover in a gunfight. Higher percentages will block more shots.
TradeMassUsageTooltip: The resulting mass usage and mass capacity.
GameUpdatedToNewVersionSavesIncompatible: This may cause saved games and mods from the old version to stop working.
DaysWorthOfFoodTooltip_CantEatLocalPlant: Based on the current season, temperature, and surroundings we assume that it will NOT be possible for herbivore animals to eat local plants. This however can change at any time.
DrugPolicyInUse: Drugs policy is in use by {0}.
InfiniteDaysWorthOfFoodInfo: Will never run out of food
SplitCaravanMassUsageTooltip: Current mass usage and mass capacity.
TooBigTransportersMassUsage: The assigned people and items are too heavy for the transport pods.
CaravanCouldNotFindPackingSpot: Could not find any valid packing spot. Make sure that the chosen exit location ({0}) is accessible.
DaysUntilRotTip: The number of days until this item starts to rot based on the average temperature in this area.
TakeToInventoryColumnDesc: An amount of the drug to pick up extra when gathering it for consumption, in order to avoid having to visit the drug stockpile every time.
FailedToRestart: Something went wrong while restarting the game. The game can't fully unload modified code from deactivated mods, so code from deactivated mods may still be active.\n\nIt's recommended that you quit and restart the game now to load all mods cleanly.
TransportersMassUsageTooltip: Current mass usage and mass capacity.\n\nYou will not be able to send the transport pods if the mass usage exceedes capacity.
PlayerFactionBaseGainsName: This community is now known as {0}.
GameUpdatedToNewVersionSavesCompatible: Saved games from the old version should be compatible, however some mods may stop working.
ConfirmAbandonPawnDialog_AllColonistsTho: All colonists will get the following thoughts:
